metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8979 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the parsePresentationContext function in storescp in DICOM dcmtk-3.6.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault) via a long string sent to TCP port 4242.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8979` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dcmtk - 3.6.1~20150924-5ubuntu0.1~esm1
libdcmtk5 - 3.6.1~20150924-5ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: dcmtk package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.1~20150924-5ubuntu0.1~esm1').
